name: discogs-mass-export
description: Personal CLI tool to mass export Discogs marketplace listings by style

scripts.api:dev: nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec "npm run build && node dist/api.js"
scripts.predev: lsof -ti :3001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -ti :5173 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; sleep 1
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "npm run api:dev" "cd web && npm run dev"
